entry.title: Feds Charge AI Music Maker for Faking Streams In $10 Million Scheme
entry.summary: Michael Smith is accused of orchestrating an elaborate plot involving fake music and fake listeners to make big money from royalties.

entry.title: Telegram CEO Vows to ‘Significantly Improve’ Moderation of Criminal Activity After Arrest
entry.summary: Pavel Durov’s first public statements acknowledge that Telegram‘s rapid growth has made it harder to police.

entry.title: Trump Doubles Down on Bitcoin, Says He's Got a Job for Elon Musk If Elected
entry.summary: Outlining the economic policies of a potential Trump administration, the former president said Musk could lead a new government fraud task force.

entry.title: Mercuryo Launches Mastercard-Enabled Crypto Debit Card
entry.summary: The virtual ‘Spend‘ card, available in the European Union, comes a few weeks after Metamask launched its own crypto-to-fiat debit card.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Ionic Faces Challenge From Disgruntled Shareholders
entry.summary: Figure Markets says it has rallied enough shareholders to force a board meeting over the future of Ionic, which formed in the wake of the Celsius bankruptcy.

entry.title: 'Wall Street', 'American Psycho' Studio Raising Film Funding via Avalanche
entry.summary: Users of investment platform Republic on Avalanche will be able to buy into a slate of films, with perks including producer credits and set visits.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Thursday, September 5? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: Nearly 90% of Crypto Firm Applications Rejected by UK Regulator
entry.summary: The Financial Conduct Authority says only four crypto asset businesses successfully registered.

entry.title: Telegram Game 'Catizen' Sets Token Launch Date as Pre-Market Trading Expands
entry.summary: Telegram puzzle game Catizen will launch its token on The Open Network this month, very close to the Hamster Kombat and Rocky Rabbit drops.

entry.title: Ethereum Restaking Protocol EigenLayer Handing Out 86 Million More Tokens
entry.summary: The Eigen Foundation behind Ethereum restaking protocol EigenLayer is launching another wave of rewards before the token begins trading.

entry.summary: You can earn millions of free in-game coins in the Telegram game Rocky Rabbit. Here are the solutions for Thursday, September 5.

entry.title: Pump.fun Retakes Lead Over Tron's SunPump as Justin Sun Pushes 'Celebrity Season'
entry.summary: Justin Sun teased a “celebrity season” on Tron as numbers fell on its token launch pad SunPump, with Solana's Pump.fun retaking its lead.

entry.title: Startup Supercharges ‘AI Ambassadors,’ 3D Worlds With Google Cloud
entry.summary: Infinite Reality is tapping the considerable resources of Google to build “more immersive and social digital experiences” for businesses.

entry.title: Fed Issues Cease and Desist Order to United Texas Bank Over Crypto-Related Concerns
entry.summary: The U.S. Federal Reserve’s order cited deficiencies in the bank's risk management systems in its dealings with crypto clients.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips Back Below $57,000 as Short-Term Holders Threaten Volatility
entry.summary: Glassnode analysts found that short-term Bitcoin holders are holding unrealized losses, raising concerns of potential sell-off pressure.

entry.title: Robinhood Settles With California for $3.9 Million Over Crypto Withdrawal Violations
entry.summary: The department's action against Robinhood marks the first such public instance by the regulator against a crypto firm, it said Wednesday.

entry.title: Circle VP Warns US Risks Falling Behind in Stablecoin Regulation Amid Political Stalemate
entry.summary: "What's important is for the U.S. to upgrade and have a structure to define what a well-regulated stablecoin looks like," Circle's VP said.

entry.title: Core Blockchain Launches LstBTC for Bitcoin Liquid Staking
entry.summary: The Core blockchain further expands its offerings with a new liquid staking token.

entry.title: Australia Introduces Non-Legally Binding AI Framework to Help Shape Future Policy
entry.summary: The standards call for risk assessment processes in Australia to identify and mitigate hazards in AI systems and ensure transparency.

entry.title: Feds Seize Domains Linked to Russian AI Disinformation Campaign
entry.summary: The U.S. Departments of Justice took down fake websites as the Treasury Department named Russian agents in the probe.

entry.title: Bitcoin Could ‘Slowly Leak’ Toward $50,000 Before Its Next Surge: Arthur Hayes
entry.summary: Just a bit more Bitcoin ‘chop’ ahead before the government floods the economy with money, predicts the BitMEX co-founder.

entry.title: If You Bought Bored Ape NFTs at the Peak, You’ve Lost 93% of Your Investment
entry.summary: As the floor price for Bored Apes languishes, a pioneering Ape puts its community-driven storyline on pause.

entry.summary: Like Hamster Kombat and Notcoin, Telegram game W-Coin will launch its token on The Open Network after players selected the network in a poll.

entry.summary: The new startup, Safe Superintelligence, received backing from NFDG, a16z, Sequoia, DST Global, and SV Angel.

entry.title: Bitfarms Bites Back at Riot in Bitcoin Mining Battle
entry.summary: The statement is the latest in the hostile takeover drama between the two Bitcoin miners.

entry.summary: Following his Republican primary victory in Massachusetts, crypto lawyer John Deaton is poised to face off against Senator Elizabeth Warren.

entry.summary: The series invites builders to develop the next killer app across consumer DeFi, sports, social, and onchain gaming on Flow.

entry.title: AI Chatbots Have Begun to Create Their Own Culture, Researchers Say
entry.summary: Is this the first step toward self-awareness—and evading human oversight?

entry.title: Trump Crypto Project Aims to Maintain US Dollar Supremacy With Stablecoins
entry.summary: The DeFi project that Donald Trump and his family are promoting, World Liberty Financial, says it is focused on boosting the U.S. dollar.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 193 - NVIDIA DROPS-OFF
entry.summary: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 192 - WTF IS ETHERVISTA
entry.summary: OI continues to rise as BTC stabilises. BTC still best performing assets class this year. FTX to distribute $16bn to creditors starting in Q4. Qatar introduces regulatory framework for crypto. ETH L1s fees down 90%, L2 activity ATH. Base hits 14m monthly users, many may be Sybil. ETH is in death spiral: Krueger. SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.

entry.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins
entry.summary: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 191 - CRYPTO STABLE
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$72m, ETH ETFs: -$2m. BTC weekly volatility returns to multi-year lows. BlackRock BTC ETF sees first outflow in months. ETH dominance hits 4-year low. Vitalik linked wallet sells $2m ETH. Bukele talks up BTC impact in Time interview. CBoE files for ETH & BTC ETF options. Elon & Tesla win DOGE manipulation lawsuit. Macron denies inviting Durov to France. Trump promises to make US the ‘crypto capital’. Trump advertises Liberty Financial DeFi project. DeFi mindshare continues to grow.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 190 - OPENSEA VS SEC
entry.summary: BTC: 59.7k (0%), ETH: 2545 (0%), SOL: 146 (-1%). Top Gainers: HNT, IMX, ICP, ADA, KCS. BTC ETFs: -$105m, ETH ETFs: +$6m. Bitcoin in tight liquidation range, ETH outperforms. ETH ETF sees first in flow in 10 days. Funding rates all turn negative. Mr 100 buys 500 BTC in dip. France formally charges Durov, can’t leave country. TON jumps 6% after Durov release. TON faces another outage related to DOGS. AI coins fall after Nvidia earnings. Crypto payments about to soar: Armstrong. Binance denies freezing Palestinian accounts. CryptoCom & Standard Chartered partner.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 189 - TRUMP LAUNCHES MORE NFTS
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$127m, ETH ETFs: -$3m. BTC hits $58k after ETF outflows, then bounces. BTC sees largest exchange outflow in a year. Divergence between BTC & stocks grows. TON stops producing blocks briefly, price bounces. TON outage linked to DOGS launch. Maker DAO rebrands as Sky. USDS upgrade from DAI will have freezing function. Robinhood readds SOL support. SEC charges 2 brothers with $60m crypto scam. Nasdaq pitches options on BTC ETFs. Full-time open source devs under 8k in crypto. Crypto owners more likely to be ‘psychopaths’.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 188 - TON CONTINUES TO FALL
entry.summary: BlackRock ETF sees biggest inflow in 35 days. BTC ETFs have 12 straight days of inflows. ETH ETFs have 8 straight days of outflows. ETH/BTC ratio continues to hit new lows. Russia to start using crypto for trade this week. Stablecoin TVL hits ATH of $168bn. Durov faces several serious charges in France. Telegram also under investigation in India. TRX flips TON, enters top 10 crypto coins. Crypto is the currency of AI: Naval. 84k new crypto millionaires created this year. SEC lawsuit against Kraken to proceed to trial. Aave proposes integration with BlackRock BUIDL. Celsius has repaid $2.5bn in assets so far.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 187 - AI TOKENS LEADING
entry.summary: AI tokens lead ahead of Nvidia earnings. Crypto funds saw $533m inflows last week. BTC ‘bull market’ back on in IFP index. BTC close to ‘parabolic zone’ soon. Many coins ‘flipping back to bullish’ indicators. Open Interest begins to creep back up again. Binance Labs to focus on AI investments. 51 L2s now built on OP stack alone. Some exchanges rejected for Hong Kong license. Vitalik questions DeFi yields in crypto. New malware steals crypto on MacOS. Avalanche Discord hacked after Polygon.

entry.title: The Meme Coin That Became a REAL Religion!
entry.summary: Pastor Kelby created a meme coin on Pumpdotfun which has since registered a church and developed its own religious theories and philosophies. Twice a day Kelby heads a sermon on Twitter where he spreads lessons from books that have personally helped him achieve happiness.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 186 - AVAX LEADS PUMP
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$65m, ETH ETFs: -$1m. Crypto stays range-bound ahead of Powell speech. Russia plans stablecoins of BRICS countries. El Salvador buys 162 BTC with daily buys. AVAX up 15% as Grayscale launches trust. Tron removes 12k BTC from USDD reserves. Trump promotes crypto DeFi project. Crypto half of corporate political donations. Tether abandons plan to launch its own blockchain. Sony backed L2 set to launch in weeks. Babylon launches BTC staking. CZ leaves prison for ‘halfway house’. PayPal & Anchorage partner for bank crypto rewards. Bitcoin mining market worth $74bn: JP Morgan. Bitfarms buys Stronghold in ‘strategic defence’.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 185 - KAMALA 'SUPPORTS' CRYPTO?
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$40m, ETH ETFs: -$18m. BTC breaks channel, ripe for ‘short squeeze’. BTC OI rises $1.3bn post Fed minutes. Kamala ‘supports crypto policies’ says advisor. Vitalik ‘bull posts’ ETH. Story Protocol raises $80m for L1. WazirX halts open orders after problems with Rupee. Coinbase & Ripple lead political donations. Salame claims government reneged on plea deal. EigenLayer team claimed coins despite being in US.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 184 - PUNKS ARE FLYING!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$88m, ETH ETFs: -$7m. BTC funding negative in ‘short squeeze’ setup. BTC dominance up 18% in 2 years. TRX leads L1s as memecoin activity soars. Chance of SOL ETF is zero in 2024: Bloomberg. Another SOL ETF approved in Brazil. Binance & CZ face new class action lawsuit. Tether to launch UAE-Dirham stablecoin. Mt Gox moves $700m in BTC. CRV founder faces backlash on DAO proposal.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 183 - WE ARE NOW SHITCOINING ON TRON
entry.summary: Crypto follows stocks higher, BTC rallies to $61k. SOL funds saw largest weekly outflow ever. Tether mints another $1bn on Tron. SEC blocked SOL ETF from CBoE. China classifies crypto for money laundering. DNC platform doesn’t mention crypto. Rumours Gensler may be Treasury Secretary pick. Chrome extension ‘Bull Checker’ leads to exploits. Genesis-linked wallet hacked for $238m. ADA drops out of the top 10 coins.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 182 - STABLECOIN CAP NEARS ATH
entry.summary: Crypto falls as soon as US stock futures open higher. Crypto funds saw $30m inflows last week. Stablecoin market cap nears ATH. US may increase crypto reporting standards. Justin Sun hints at lift to China crypto ban. Tether to launch USDT on Aptos. MATIC to POL migration on September 4th. TON leads L1s on continued gaming strength.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 181 - GIGA HITS $300M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$11m, ETH ETFs: -$40m. BTC hits $56k then rebounds, $176m liquidated. Schumer says crypto policy can pass this year. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Bernstein moves several BTC miners to ‘Outperform’. Miners raised $2.2bn in Q2 to help cash crunch. EigenLayer TVL falls $351m after airdrop controversy. ARB announces staking. S. Korea pension fund buys $34m of MicroStrategy. Coinbase allows gold & oil futures trading.

entry.title: This Hedge Fund Buys Meme Coins. Here’s Why.
entry.summary: Crypto hedge fund Stratos bought Dogwifhat (WIF) when it was just 1 cent and has since continued investing in meme coins. We spoke with Rennick Palley, founder of Stratos, to hear the firm’s perspective on investing in these tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 180 - BTC BACK DOWN, AGAIN
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$81m, ETH ETFs: +$11m. Crypto falls as markets react negatively to CPI print. BTC whale buying slows, death cross on weekly. Low CPI print could still lead to BTC ATH: Grayscale. Exchanges see $1bn USDT withdrawal. US government sends $584m BTC to exchanges. Apple Pay may soon allow USDC payments. Schumer vows to pass crypto regulation this year. Morgan Stanley discloses $188m BTC ETF holding. Vanguard say they won’t do BTC ETFs. Marathon Digital buys $249m BTC. DeFi rises as Aave hits weekly high in borrowers. BitGo continues to stress autonomy from Justin Sun. Binance returns to India.

entry.title: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary Welcomes Crypto Regulation, Slams Celebrity 'Shitcoins'
entry.summary: Whether it's celebrity meme coins or Tom Brady, Canadian investor and "Shark Tank" star Kevin O'Leary tells it like it is. In this interview with Decrypt reporter André Beganski, O'Leary breaks down his approach to the crypto market and why "cowboys" became a thing of the past. Amid crypto's "renaissance" period, he sees prediction markets and stablecoins as bright spots, while regulation looks inevitable for a maturing industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 179 - PUMP FUN STILL RISING!
entry.summary: Crypto rallies ahead of key CPI data today. $2bn more Mt. Gox BTC readies to moved. Jump transfers another $46m ETH to sell. SOL stablecoin TVL up $1bn in the last 3 weeks. Goldman Sachs show $418m BTC ETF. BTC ETFs will soon surpass Satoshi’s holding. ETH L2 transactions hit record 12.4m. Harris advisors have poor history with crypto policy. Bitget wallet overtakes MetaMask by downloads. Coinbase say cbBTC wrapped Bitcoin coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 178 - TRUMP AND ELON ON X
entry.summary: SOLETH down 10% from ATH. Grayscale ETH ETF shows no outflows. Bitcoin slump due to rising Kamala odds: Bernstein. Alt season won’t return until BTC above $70k: Hayes. PayPal stablecoin on SOL flips ETH TVL. 3AC files $1.3bn claim against Terraform Labs. Marathon to stamp ‘Made in USA’ on mined BTC. Trump & Elon don’t mention crypto in interview. Coinbase urges SEC to abandon DeFi exchange rule. Several VCs receive SEC letters over Uniswap. OP hints at upcoming ‘Superchain’.
